synonyms: hiraṇya-garbhera—of the total of the living entities; ātmā—the Supersoul; garbha-udaka-śāyī—Garbhodakaśāyī Viṣṇu; vyaṣṭi—the individual; jīva—of the living entity; antaḥ-yāmī—Supersoul; kṣīra-udaka-śāyī—Kṣīrodakaśāyī Viṣṇu.
translation: "Garbhodakaśāyī Viṣṇu is the Supersoul of the aggregate of living entities, and Kṣīrodakaśāyī Viṣṇu is the Supersoul of each individual living being.
